thread.title: Rail fares set to rise by 1pc as inflation creeps up
thread.title_full: Rail fares set to rise by 1pc as inflation creeps up

author: Szu Ping Chan
title: Rail fares set to rise by 1pc as inflation creeps up
text: Economics Rail fares set to rise by 1pc as inflation creeps up Rail fare increases next year confirmed at 1pc but pound jumps as core inflation measure, which strips out energy and food price movements, rises faster than expected Tuesday's data confirmed that rail fares would rise by 1pc in January Photo: PA By Szu Ping Chan
